defensiveActions.name: Disengage
defensiveActions.desc: Impose DisADV on Opportunity Attacks against you until the start of your next turn.
defensiveActions.descSummary: Disengage (1 AP): DisADV on Opportunity Attacks until your next turn.

variant.name: Full Disengage
variant.desc: Be immune to Opportunity Attacks until the start of your next turn.

defensiveActions.name: Dodge
defensiveActions.desc: Impose DisADV on the next Attack or Grapple against you until the start of your next turn.
defensiveActions.descSummary: Dodge (1 AP): Next attack against you has DisADV.

variant.name: Full Dodge
variant.desc: Impose DisADV on all Attacks or Grapples against you until the start of your next turn.

defensiveActions.name: Hide
defensiveActions.desc: Make a Stealth Check vs Passive Awareness to hide from creatures.
defensiveActions.descSummary: Hide (1 AP): Stealth Check vs Passive Awareness.

offensiveActions.name: Attack
offensiveActions.descSummary: Attack (1 AP): Make an attack check.

offensiveActions.name: Disarm
offensiveActions.desc: Attack Check vs Athletics, Acrobatics, or Trickery.
offensiveActions.descSummary: Disarm (1 AP): Contested check to remove item.

offensiveActions.name: Grapple
offensiveActions.desc: Use a free hand, Athletics Check vs Martial Check. Depends on creature size.
offensiveActions.descSummary: Grapple (1 AP): Athletics vs Martial, restrain target.

offensiveActions.name: Shove
offensiveActions.descSummary: Shove (1 AP): Push target with contested check.

offensiveActions.name: Tackle
offensiveActions.desc: Move 2+ Spaces straight and Tackle (Grappled, you and target move 1 Space and fall Prone) a same Size or smaller creature, Athletics vs Martial.
offensiveActions.descSummary: Tackle (1 AP): Charge and grapple, both fall prone.

utilityActions.name: Move
utilityActions.desc: Move up to your Speed. Can split movement but cannot end your turn in an occupied Space.
utilityActions.descSummary: Move (1 AP): Move up to your Speed.

utilityActions.name: Help
utilityActions.desc: Grant a creature a d8 Help Die (lasts until the start of your next turn). Applies to Attack or Skill check.
utilityActions.descSummary: Help (1 AP): Give ally d8 Help Die.

utilityActions.name: Object
utilityActions.desc: e.g. Drink/administer a Potion, Lock/unlock a lock, transfer/toss an item
utilityActions.descSummary: Object (1 AP): Interact with objects or items.

utilityActions.name: Spell
utilityActions.desc: Cast a Spell you know. May require MP.

utilityActions.name: Combo Spellcasting
utilityActions.desc: 2+ creatures can combine AP and MP to enhance a Spell.
utilityActions.descSummary: Combo Spellcasting: Multiple casters combine resources for enhanced spell.

reactions.name: Held Actions
reactions.desc: Declare an action and a trigger outside of your turn.
reactions.descSummary: Held Actions: Prepare action with trigger.

reactions.name: Grit Points (GP)
reactions.desc: Reduce 1 damage from an attack or give yourself ADV on a save.
reactions.descSummary: Grit Points (1 GP): Reduce damage by 1 or gain ADV on save.

reactions.name: Opportunity Attack
reactions.desc: Spend 1 AP to make a melee attack.
reactions.descSummary: Opportunity Attack (1 AP): Attack when enemy leaves reach.

reactions.name: Spell Duel
reactions.desc: Spend 2 AP and 1+ MP to challenge the creature with a Spell Duel.
reactions.descSummary: Spell Duel (2 AP, 1+ MP): Counter enemy spell with contested check.
